a.title: Remote Learning During the COVID-19 Crisis

div.div: Remote Learning During the COVID-19 Crisis

span.style: float: none; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255); font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: 700; letter-spacing: 0.3px; text-align: left; text-decoration: none; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; display: inline !important; font-family: "Open Sans", sans-serif; font-size: 16px; color: rgb(192, 0, 0);

span.br: Philadelphia E&T Charter High School is committed to the continuity of education for all of our students during the COVID-19 mandatory school closure.

span.style: float: none; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255); font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: 700; letter-spacing: 0.3px; text-align: left; text-decoration: none; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; display: inline !important; font-family: "Open Sans", sans-serif; font-size: 16px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);

br.span: On April 1, 2020, we will enact our Remote Learning Plan. Please visit our COVID-19 Academic Plans page for more information.
